QueryResult.text: SELECT N.ID, N.CREATED_DATE, N.CREATED_BY, N.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, N.LAST_UPDATED_BY, N.LOCALIZED_MESSAGE, N.EVENT_TYPE, N.EVENT_LINK, N.SENDER_ID, N.RECEIVER_ID, U.USER_NAME SENDER_USER_NAME, U.FIRST_NAME SENDER_FIRST_NAME, U.LAST_NAME SENDER_LAST_NAME, U.EMAIL_ADDRESS FROM CLB_NOTIFICATIONS N, CMN_SEC_USERS U WHERE N.SENDER_ID = U.ID
